title: Download recently liked songs automatically with Spotify
author: Mario
readme:
## Purpose

This workflow enables you to listen to your recent favorites in very hight quality offline without sacrificing all of your storage.

## How it works

This workflow automatically creates a playlist in Spotify named "Downloads" which periodically gets updated so it always contains only a defined amount of the latest liked songs.

This enables only the Downloads playlist to set for automatic downloading and thus free up space on the device.

## Setup

  * The workflow is ready to go. Just select your Spotify credentials and activate the workflow.
  * In Spotify just enable automatic downloads on the automatically created Downloads folder after the first workflow run.



## Current limitations

This setup currently supports a maximum of 50 songs in the Downloads Playlist. This is due to the paylod limits defined by Spotify encountered in the _Get liked songs_ node. Implementing batching would solve the issue.
readme_zh:
## 目的

本工作流程能让您以极高品质离线收听近期收藏的歌曲，同时避免占用过多设备存储空间。

## 运作原理

该工作流程会在Spotify自动创建名为"Downloads"的播放列表，并定期更新该列表，确保其中始终只保留指定数量的最新收藏歌曲。

通过仅对"Downloads"播放列表启用自动下载功能，从而释放设备存储空间。

## 设置说明

* 工作流程开箱即用，只需选择您的Spotify账号并激活流程
* 首次运行后，请在Spotify中对自动生成的"Downloads"播放列表启用自动下载功能

## 当前限制

由于Spotify在_获取喜欢歌曲_节点中设定的有效载荷限制，当前下载播放列表最多支持50首歌曲。采用分批处理机制可解决此问题。
title_zh: 自动下载最近喜欢的Spotify歌曲
